law.text: There may be a provision as follows: "Illegal Occupation: The insurer shall not be liable for any loss to which a contributing cause was the insured's commission of or attempt to commit a felony or to which a contributing cause was the insured's being engaged in an illegal occupation."
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 17, sec. 28, effective June 18, 1970.
